presentation_1: I'm a Software Developer with hands-on experience in full-stack web development for over %YEARS% years.
presentation_2: My current stack includes TypeScript with Next.js or Nuxt on the front end, and .NET Core on the back end.
presentation_3: In my free time, I enjoy socializing with friends over a drink and tinkering with my home automation setup.
firstMotivationText: I enjoy building user-friendly and efficient web applications that solve real problems.
secondMotivationText: Turning small ideas into practical solutions is what keeps me curious and motivated.
getInTouchText: Reach out via the social links below.
